--- create_uniq_null_filtered_index.sql
create unique null_filtered index foo_bar on foo (foo)

--- AST
&parser.CreateIndex{
  pos:          0,
  end:          54,
  Unique:       true,
  NullFiltered: true,
  Name:         &parser.Ident{
    pos:  34,
    end:  41,
    Name: "foo_bar",
  },
  TableName: &parser.Ident{
    pos:  45,
    end:  48,
    Name: "foo",
  },
  Keys: []*parser.IndexKey{
    &parser.IndexKey{
      end:  53,
      Name: &parser.Ident{
        pos:  50,
        end:  53,
        Name: "foo",
      },
      Dir: "",
    },
  },
  Storing:      (*parser.Storing)(nil),
  InterleaveIn: (*parser.InterleaveIn)(nil),
}

--- SQL
CREATE UNIQUE NULL_FILTERED INDEX foo_bar ON foo (foo)
